name: Jsspin
tagline: start your nodejs -express project automatically - also supports automatic global installation of node and  express on redhat distributions
body: A script that creates a new node js project in the specified directory and sets node and express requirements(based on global installation details) in the package.json file. If no global installation exists then it can be performed automatically (for redhat distributions).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
